title: Monsoon season: HPTDC offers 20-40 pc discount on room rent in 41 hotels in Himachal
description: Himachal Pradesh Tourism Development Corporation offers discounts on room rent in various hotel units during the monsoon season, excluding specific hotels in different regions.
